Aether.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deal #yPiercing damage to ALL enemies.

Affinity.DESCRIPTION: #yAffinity can be of any color between NL [A-Red], [A-Green], [A-Blue], [A-Light], [A-Dark]. NL [A-Gen] refers either to generic #yAffinity, or your current best #yAffinity.

Affinity Token.DESCRIPTION: #yPower which increases your #yAffinity for the rest of combat.

Agility.DESCRIPTION: Reduced by #b1 each turn. Upon reaching NL #b3, #b6, #b9, and #b12 [A], gain #yDexterity.

Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Reduced by #b1 each turn. Upon reaching NL #b4, #b8, #b12, and #b16 [B], gain [Vitality].

Blur.DESCRIPTION: Your #yBlock will not be removed at the start of your next turn.

Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain the specified power, it does not decrease at the start of next turn.

Burning.DESCRIPTION: Increases incoming #yAttack damage by #b15% (min. #b1 additional damage). NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to half the amount of [Burning] and reduce [Burning] by #b1.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Corruption.DESCRIPTION: Reduced by #b1 each turn. Upon reaching #b5, #b7, #b9 and #b11 #yCorruption, gain [Ritual]. Upon reaching #b13 #yCorruption, obtain #pSummoning #pRitual.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the start of each turn.

Earth.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Gain temporary #yThorns while #yChanneled. Automatically #yEvoked after 3 turns, dealing damage split randomly amongst ALL enemies.

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: Take less damage from Attacks. NL Example: NL #b10 -> #g10%, #b25 -> #g20%, NL #b50 -> #g33%, #b100 -> #g50%

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yPoison.

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Changes into a random orb whenever you play an #yAttack. Retains its last form at the end of turn.

Fire.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Applies #yBurning and damages the highest health enemy.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose #b1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at #b0 stacks.

Force.DESCRIPTION: Reduced by #b1 each turn. Upon reaching NL #b3, #b6, #b9, and #b12 [F], gain #yStrength.

Freezing.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yAttack damage by #b3, or by #b4 if at least #b1 [Frost] is #yChanneled. At the end of turn, reduce [Freezing] by #b1.

Intellect.DESCRIPTION: Reduced by #b1 each turn. Upon reaching NL #b3, #b6, #b9, and #b12 [I], gain #yFocus.

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of turn.

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Multicolor.DESCRIPTION: Counts as an #yAffinity of any color.

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, enemy takes #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn.

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP last until end of combat.

Vitality.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [TempHP].

~Elemental.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. Deal #b30% additional damage if the enemy has #yBlock.

~Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: #yExhausted if in hand at the end of turn.

~Haste.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, lose #yHaste and draw 1 card.

~Innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand.

~Lock-On.DESCRIPTION: Receive #b50% more damage from Orbs and #yRanged attacks.

~Retain.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn. NL If it is an [A-Gen] Power, not reduced at the start of next turn.

~RetainOnce.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn.

~Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
